thegame.utils

Class SettingsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • thegame.utils.SettingsManager

  • public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for game settings that persists values between game sessions. Handles loading, saving, and providing access to user preferences.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • loadSettings

        public static void loadSettings()
        Loads settings from the properties file. If the file doesn't exist, default values are used.

      • saveSettings

        public static void saveSettings()
        Saves the current settings to the properties file.

        Gets the music volume.
        Returns:
        The music volume (0.0-1.0)

      • isFullscreen

        public static boolean isFullscreen()
        Checks if fullscreen mode is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if fullscreen is enabled, false otherwise

      • setFullscreen

        public static void setFullscreen(boolean fs)
        Sets the fullscreen mode.
        Parameters:
        fs - true to enable fullscreen, false for windowed mode

      • isVsync

        public static boolean isVsync()
        Checks if vertical synchronization is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if vsync is enabled, false otherwise

      • setVsync

        public static void setVsync(boolean vs)
        Sets the vertical synchronization.
        Parameters:
        vs - true to enable vsync, false to disable

      • getAntiAliasing

        public static int getAntiAliasing()
        Gets the anti-aliasing level.
        Returns:
        The anti-aliasing level (0=Off, 2=2x, 4=4x, 8=8x)

      • setAntiAliasing

        public static void setAntiAliasing(int aa)
        Sets the anti-aliasing level.
        Parameters:
        aa - The anti-aliasing level (0=Off, 2=2x, 4=4x, 8=8x)
